levels.description: After deployment, stops attacking for <@ba.vup>{duration}</>s, less likely to be attacked by enemies, Talent 1's Physical and Arts hit rate reduction effect on ground enemies increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale}</>x; when the skill ends, deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_s2:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all ground enemies within the smoke
